text: The women's 48 kilograms (Extra lightweight) competition at the 2018 Asian Games in Jakarta was held on 29 August at the Jakarta Convention Center Assembly Hall. Jeong Bo-kyeong of South Korea won the gold medal. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | rowspan=5|Wednesday, 29 August 2018 || 09:00 || Elimination round of 16 |- | 09:00 || Quarterfinals |- | 09:00 || Repechage |- | 09:00 || Semifinals |- | 16:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Finals |} ==Results== ===Main bracket=== ===Repechage=== ==References== ==External links== *Official website *Official website Women's 48
title: Judo at the 2018 Asian Games – Women's 48 kg
